short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR code for current webpage URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
网页二维码分享助手是一款简单而强大的Chrome扩展程序，让您轻松实现电脑与手机之间的网页分享。

主要功能：
✓ 一键生成：自动获取当前网页链接并生成二维码
✓ 自定义链接：支持手动输入任意URL生成二维码
✓ 即时生成：本地生成二维码，无需联网，响应迅速
✓ 简洁界面：优雅的设计，简单直观的操作方式
✓ 安全可靠：完全离线运行，保护您的隐私安全
✓ 便捷分享：扫描二维码即可在手机上打开网页

使用场景：
- 将电脑上浏览的文章分享到手机上继续阅读
- 快速将网页链接分享给周围的人
- 将购物网站商品页面转到手机上继续浏览
- 在手机上打开电脑上的教程或文档

无需复杂设置，安装即可使用。让网页分享变得简单快捷！

URL QR Code Share is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that bridges the gap between desktop and mobile browsing.

Key Features:
✓ One-Click Generation: Automatically creates QR code for current webpage
✓ Custom URL Support: Manually input any URL to generate QR code
✓ Instant Generation: Creates QR codes locally without internet connection
✓ Clean Interface: Elegant design with intuitive controls
✓ Security: Operates completely offline for your privacy
✓ Easy Sharing: Scan QR code to open webpages on mobile devices

Use Cases:
- Continue reading articles from desktop to mobile
- Quick webpage sharing with people nearby
- Transfer shopping pages to your mobile device
- Access tutorials or documents on your phone

Install and start sharing - no setup required. Make webpage sharing effortless!
